description:
Introducing Match Score, the essential app for every football enthusiast. With Match Score, you can stay effortlessly connected to the world of football, accessing a wealth of information right at your fingertips. From match schedules to results, Match Score ensures you're always in the loop.

Key Features:


Upcoming Matches & Results:
Never miss a game again! Match Score provides a comprehensive schedule of all upcoming matches, allowing you to plan your viewing in advance. Additionally, you can easily check the results of past matches, keeping you up to date with the latest developments in the football world.

Favorites:
Track your favorite teams and matches with ease. Match Score's Favorites feature lets you select the teams and matches that matter most to you. Receive real-time notifications when these matches are about to start, ensuring you never miss a moment of the action.

Predictions:
Enhance your game-day experience with expert insights and predictions. Match Score offers detailed analysis and predictions for today's matches, helping you stay informed and engaged. Whether you're a casual fan or a seasoned follower, these predictions add an extra layer of excitement to your football experience.

Stay effortlessly connected to the football world with Match Score. Download the app today and make it your go-to source for all football updates and information.

app_name: Lok L0k: Watch TV drama, Movie
description:
Lok L0k — Your All-Access Pass to the World of Movies.

This ultimate movie companion is designed for film lovers who want it all — discovery, excitement, and a front-row seat to every story.

- Browse Your Way – Explore films by genre, rating, or release date, and find exactly what fits your mood.

- Never Miss a Premiere – Get instant alerts for new releases and upcoming must-see premieres.

- Your Watchlist, Your Rules – Save the titles you can’t wait to see and track the ones you’ve conquered.

- Rate & Relive – Share your take on movies and TV shows, and watch reviews from critics and fans alongside cast info and full details.

- IPTV Smart Player – Enjoy smooth, integrated playback with a built-in, smart viewing experience.

Download the app and step into a cinematic universe like never before.

Data Source Transparency

All movie and TV details — including images, ratings, and descriptions — are powered by The Movie Database (TMDB).
We use the TMDB API to bring you this rich library of content, but we are not endorsed or certified by TMDB.

Important Disclaimer

This app is an entertainment guide, not a streaming service.
We are not affiliated with, or endorsed by, any third-party content providers or film studios.
No movies or TV shows are streamed or hosted within the app.
All trademarks, copyrights, and other intellectual property remain the property of their respective owners.

- Discover Now Playing / Popular / Top / Trending / Upcoming / Best Of Years Movies & TV Shows
- Quick search for movies and TV series by title
- Watch trailers and other videos
- Create your own watchlists for movies
- TV series calendar
- Detailed information about movies and TV series
- Rate Movies/TV shows in app and explore other rating
- Complete list of episodes for TV series with complete information about the episodes
- Search for services where you can buy, rent, stream films and series
- Watch videos (HD fullsreen) about movies and TV shows without leaving the app
- Profiles of actors with their full filmography
- Simple and user-friendly application interface
- Browsing history
- No account required

Disclaimer: 
In the application, you cannot watch films and series for free, but you can find in the application a complete description of the series and films and also the service on which you can watch them.

All movies information and images are from TMDB.org licensed under CC BY-NC 4.0: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/

This app uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb: https://www.themoviedb.org/documentation/api/terms-of-use

Listen AI: Unveiling the Power of Text-to-Speech

Turn Text into Speech and Open Your Ears to the Written Word

Listen AI isn't just a text-to-speech tool, it's your effortless companion for a world of information, narrated at your pace. Here's how Listen AI elevates your experience:

Unmatched Vocal Majesty: Immerse yourself in a variety of crystal-clear, expressive voices that blur the line between human and machine. Choose from a range of accents and personalities to find the perfect narrator for any content, be it a casual blog post or a formal report.

Customization at Your Fingertips: Tailor your listening experience to your preferences. Adjust the speaking rate to match your comprehension speed, or fine-tune the volume for optimal comfort.

Effortless Integration: Forget copy-pasting. Listen AI seamlessly converts text from documents and web pages into spoken content. Highlight a passage on a website, a section in a PDF, or an entire document, and Listen AI will bring it to life with its captivating narration.

Multitasking Masterclass: Free up your eyes and ears for other activities. Listen to articles, web pages, and PDFs while you exercise, commute, cook, or complete chores. Listen AI lets you learn and stay informed while you conquer your to-do list.

Accessibility Champion: Listen AI is a game-changer for those with visual impairments or learning disabilities. Reading lengthy documents or educational materials can be a challenge. Listen AI transforms text into an engaging audio experience, making learning and information access more accessible than ever before.

Listen AI: It's not just reading, it's experiencing.

Terms and Conditions: https://static.listenai.app/terms-conditions-en.html
Privacy Policy: https://static.listenai.app/privacy-en.html
Community Guidelines: https://static.listenai.app/community-guidelines-en.html

The world is complex, and changing fast. The Economist app unlocks independent reporting and news analysis from correspondents across the globe. With articles, podcasts, videos and more, our app is a simple way to understand big news developments and why they matter.

Now introducing The Economist Insider, a premium video offering available at launch for subscribers to The Economist. Join senior editors as they explain what's happening now—and what comes next.

What does The Economist cover?

With expert journalists around the world, The Economist reports on politics in America and around the world, as well as economics, business, science, technology and more. We connect the dots to explain the news today and implications for tomorrow.

Why choose The Economist app?

- Read global, fact-checked news reporting anywhere
- Listen to award-winning podcasts and audio articles
- Watch videos that distill big news 

Get access to independent news reporting on your terms:

- Catch up on the news quickly with The World in Brief 
- Enjoy early access to weekly edition, ahead of print
- Download articles for offline reading

Play news games to test your knowledge:

- Mini crossword: The Economist’s wordplay news puzzle
- Dateline history quiz: guess when news extracts were published 
- Pint-sized news quiz: have you been following the latest headlines?

Enjoy additional features:

- Bookmark news articles to read later
- Give news articles to friends and family
- Read news analysis easily with adjustable text size
- Toggle dark mode

See what The Economist subscribers say:

“Great app, excellent journalism! The Economist is wonderful. The content is interesting and relevant and the reporting is superlative. Equally impressive is the drive to stay relevant by presenting media in multiple formats, from print to podcasts and short videos.”

“Impeccable journalism with an app to match. The Economist doesn’t need my endorsement of the quality of their journalism. It speaks for itself. Rather, I’ll comment that their app is well-designed and refreshing to use…I love being able to easily download entire editions, listen to articles with real narrators and search for past articles.”

Full terms of use: https://www.economist.com/legal/terms-of-use
Our privacy policy: https://www.economist.com/privacy

Peech – Turn Anything Into Audiobooks!

Meet Peech, your personal AI-powered reading sidekick that transforms all your text - PDFs, web articles, physical books, and more - into crystal-clear audiobooks. Whether you’re racing through study notes, catching up on blog posts, or diving into that spicy new novel, Peech has you covered.

The Magic of AI Voices
	• Smart Voice Matching: Peech’s advanced AI picks the perfect voice for each genre - whether it’s serious academic reading or a lighthearted romance.
	• Natural & Lifelike: Our voices are so real, you might forget you’re listening to an app.

Effortless Content Scanning
	• Lightning-Fast OCR: Snap a pic of any page or book, and Peech instantly converts it to audio. No more manual typing!
	• Web & PDF Parsing: Just paste a link or upload a file to start listening - perfect for busy pros, students, and anyone who prefers ears over eyes.

Speedy Reading, On-the-Go
	• High-Speed Playback: Devour your favorite content up to 5x faster - perfect for power-learners or those who want to binge-listen on the run.
	• Playlists & Autoplay: Build custom playlists to keep the stories rolling, so you can multitask like a boss.

One App, All Languages
	• Automatic Language Detection: Peech seamlessly identifies and narrates in 60+ languages.
	• Global Accessibility: Great for language learners, busy professionals, and anyone with reading challenges.

Why Peech?
	• Students: Turn textbooks into engaging audio lectures - study smarter, not harder.
	• Busy Professionals: Catch up on news, memos, or trade articles during your commute.
	• Accessibility: An empowering reading solution for users with visual or reading impairments.
	• Content Lovers: From classics to your favorite steamy novels - Peech reads it all.

Free Trials & Subscriptions

Experience Peech with our flexible subscription plans, some offering free trials. Dive into unlimited content and see how Peech revolutionizes your reading routine - no commitment, no hassle.

Ready to transform your reading life? Give Peech a try and unlock the power of AI-driven audio today!

The CNN app is your destination for unrivaled, fact-based reporting. Stay informed at every turn as the story breaks through short-form videos, interactives, articles, podcasts, live audio and more. Easily discover the day's top news from politics, health, world news, climate and beyond.

Download the CNN app to start making sense of the world today.

START STREAMING THE CNN EXPERIENCE TODAY.
Now watch unlimited streaming, including 24/7 global news, daily programs from trusted journalists, award-winning shows and films, and more.

FOLLOW LIVE UPDATES.
Set custom alerts and notifications so you can follow developing stories. Our "live update" articles evolve as the news comes in, giving you accurate updates as they happen.

WATCH THE STORY UNFOLD.
See it for yourself with CNN’s live video or be in the know quickly with CNN Shorts.

STAY SHARP WITH EXPERT INSIGHTS.
Delivering in-depth analysis and context that matters from award-winning journalists, so you're prepared for what's next.

DIVE DEEPER WITH LIVE REPORTING.
Enjoy a 5-minute preview of CNN live. Unlock unlimited viewing, including CNN's original series and documentary collection, CNN, CNN International, and HLN by logging into your TV provider. Stay caught up with video clips, no login necessary.

From travel and style news to the latest in entertainment, discover feel-good stories and get a daily dose of positivity.

LISTEN TO STAY CONNECTED.

تطبيق Osamh TV هو وجهتك الأولى لمشاهدة القنوات العربية والعالمية بث مباشر بجودة عالية HD وبدون تقطيع. يوفر التطبيق تجربة مشاهدة مميزة تشمل القنوات الرياضية، الإخبارية، الدينية، والترفيهية بالإضافة إلى المسلسلات العربية التي تُعرض مباشرة داخل التطبيق دون الحاجة إلى روابط خارجية.

مع Osamh TV يمكنك متابعة أهم المباريات والبطولات العالمية والعربية لحظة بلحظة عبر مجموعة ضخمة من القنوات الرياضية المتجددة باستمرار. كما يمكنك الاستمتاع بمشاهدة القنوات الإخبارية العربية والعالمية لمتابعة أحدث الأحداث، إلى جانب القنوات الدينية وقنوات الأطفال والقنوات الترفيهية التي تناسب جميع أفراد العائلة.

يتميز التطبيق بتصميم أنيق وواجهة سهلة الاستخدام تتيح للمستخدم التنقل بسرعة بين القنوات والفئات المختلفة، مما يجعل تجربة المشاهدة سلسة ومريحة. كما يتم تحديث التطبيق بشكل دوري لإضافة أحدث القنوات والباقات الجديدة وتحسين الأداء العام.

تطبيق Osamh TV يعتبر الخيار الأمثل لكل من يبحث عن تطبيق بث مباشر مجاني لمشاهدة القنوات العربية والعالمية في مكان واحد وبجودة HD عالية. التطبيق خفيف وسريع ويعمل بسلاسة على جميع الأجهزة دون انقطاع.

مميزات تطبيق Osamh TV:

يتمييز التطبيق بسهولة استخدامة بدون تسجيل دخول او اشتراك او تطبيق مشغل خارجي

بث مباشر لجميع القنوات العربية والعالمية بجودة HD ووضوح مذهل.

قنوات رياضية لمتابعة المباريات والبطولات العالمية والعربية.

قنوات دينية وقنوات إخبارية تعمل على مدار الساعة.

مشاهدة المسلسلات العربية مباشرة من التطبيق بدون روابط خارجية.

واجهة أنيقة وسهلة الاستخدام لجميع الأعمار.

تحديثات مستمرة لإضافة أحدث القنوات وتحسين الأداء.

خفيف وسريع بدون تقطيع أثناء المشاهدة حتى على الإنترنت البطيء.

تطبيق Osamh TV هو كل ما تحتاجه لمتابعة البث المباشر لجميع القنوات العربية والعالمية مجانًا في أي وقت ومن أي مكان.


المبرمج م/ اسامة فاضل

Discover the YouScribe App
With the YouScribe app, you can explore a vibrant library of audiobooks, eBooks, comics, podcasts, and more! Choose your favorite titles, build personalized reading lists, and stream thousands of works on your phone, tablet, or laptop. You can even enjoy your library offline—anytime, anywhere.

Why You’ll Love YouScribe

A dynamic library to match your interests
- A unique catalogue spanning over 120 themes: novels and short stories, sci-fi, romance, thrillers, personal development, professional resources, and much more.
- Learn and level up with lessons, theses, research papers, essays, and technical or professional documents.
- Smart recommendations to help you discover local and international hits tailored to your taste.
- Multi-format reading—seamlessly switch between text and audio on mobile, tablet, or computer.

Your portable, personalized library
- Offline mode: download and read anywhere, even without an internet connection.
- Automatic sync: pick up right where you left off, on any device.
- Reading comfort: dark mode, adjustable fonts, bookmarks, sleep timer, and more.
- Advanced search: find exactly what you’re looking for in seconds.
- Customized collections: create your own themed shelves and reading lists.
- Community connection: follow your favorite authors and their new releases.
- Personalized experience: receive tailored notifications about new content and features.

How It Works
YouScribe is available in more than 25 countries and offers a constantly expanding catalogue of local and international titles in over 11 languages.
Your subscription gives you unlimited access to our regularly updated library of audiobooks, eBooks, comics, newspapers, and more.
Subscriptions made through the app are billed to your Apple account and renew automatically at the end of each period, unless you turn off auto-renewal in your Apple account settings at least 24 hours before renewal.
If a free trial is available, you’ll need to provide a payment method when signing up—but don’t worry! You won’t be charged if you cancel before the trial ends.
The catalogue, languages, and subscription options may vary by region. Some titles or offers mentioned here may not be available in your country or plan.

Our Commitments
For the price of a single book, enjoy unlimited access to our entire catalogue—and cancel anytime.
We partner with publishers, authors, and creators around the world to bring you a living library that reflects you and your world.
Whether you love reading at night, listening during your commute, or taking a break in the middle of the day—YouScribe is there for you, wherever and whenever inspiration strikes.

Download the app today and open the door to thousands of stories, skills, and discoveries.

DIE ZEIT steht für preisgekrönten Journalismus – mit aktuellen Nachrichten, Schlagzeilen, tiefgehenden Reportagen, Podcasts und Videos aus der ZEIT-Redaktion.
Dazu: Hintergründe, Datenvisualisierungen und die wöchentliche Ausgabe der ZEIT als E-Paper – fundiert, unabhängig, multimedial.

ZEIT und ZEIT ONLINE sind jetzt vereint unter einer Marke: DIE ZEIT.

Neben News zu den wichtigsten Ereignissen und Live-Berichterstattung finden Sie das vollständige E-Paper der aktuellen ZEIT-Ausgabe und exklusive Z+-Artikel. Ergänzt wird das Angebot durch Hintergründe zu Politik, Wirtschaft, Gesellschaft, Kultur und Wissen.

Bleiben Sie informiert mit fundierten Analysen, exklusiven Recherchen, Reportagen und Schlagzeilen, Podcasts mit unserem neuen Audioplayer und entdecken Sie Empfehlungen direkt aus der Redaktion.

Auch im Bewegtbild begleitet Sie DIE ZEIT multimedial: Erleben Sie aktuelle Nachrichten mit Videos, Livestreams und Hochkant-Formaten aus der Redaktion.

Mein Abo – alles im Digitalpaket
Hier finden Sie alle Inhalte Ihres Digitalabos: Z+-Artikel, exklusive Inhalte wie Rezepte aus dem Wochenmarkt, Rätselklassiker wie Sudoku und „Um die Ecke gedacht“, das E-Paper der aktuellen ZEIT und mehr.
 
Audio – Hören statt lesen
Im Audiobereich finden Sie alle Podcasts der ZEIT, wie unseren Nachrichtenpodcast „Was jetzt?“ und ZEIT Verbrechen. Außerdem hören Sie vorgelesene Artikel aus der aktuellen ZEIT. Für ein personalisiertes Hörerlebnis können Sie einzelne Episoden oder die Hörversionen von Artikeln Ihrer Warteschlange hinzufügen, um diese ohne Unterbrechung zu hören.
 
Spiele & Rätsel
Täglich neu: Spielen Sie das beliebte Worträtsel Wortiger, die Buchstabiene oder einen unserer Klassiker: Sudoku, Kreuzworträtsel oder das Quiz.
 
Menü & Navigation
Im Inhaltemenü (links oben im Start-Tab) finden Sie alle Ressorts und wichtigen Übersichtsseiten wie die Newsletterübersicht oder das ZEIT-Archiv.
Im Nutzermenü (rechts oben im Start-Tab) finden Sie zusätzliche Funktionen: Dark Mode, Schriftgrößenanpassung, Ihre persönliche Merkliste – und die Möglichkeit, Push-Benachrichtigungen zu aktivieren. So bleiben Sie informiert über Live-Updates, Schlagzeilen und Eilmeldungen in Echtzeit.
 
ZEIT Widgets
Bleiben Sie auf dem Laufenden – direkt vom Homescreen: Mit unseren Widgets können Sie sich empfohlene Artikel, Schlagzeilen oder unsere aktuell meistgelesenen Artikel anzeigen lassen.
 
Ihr Abo – alles inklusive
Mit einem ZEIT-ONLINE-Digitalabo erhalten Sie Zugriff auf alle Inhalte der App sowie
•	DIE ZEIT E-Paper App
•	ZEIT Audio App
•	E-Reader-Formate
•	Fachkundiger ZEIT-Kundensupport
 
In-App-Abos über iTunes
Die Abrechnung erfolgt über Ihr iTunes-Konto. Nach Ablauf der gewählten Laufzeit wird das Abo automatisch verlängert, sofern Sie nicht spätestens 24 Stunden vorher kündigen.
 
Fragen oder Feedback zur App?
Schreiben Sie uns gerne an apps@zeit.de
Datenschutzerklärung: https://datenschutz.zeit.de/zon
AGB: https://www.zeit.de/administratives/agb-kommentare-artikel

Discover original reporting and understand the events shaping the world in The New York Times app. Follow breaking news and get live updates. Watch news videos that provide context on top stories. Listen to news podcasts, culture podcasts, narrated articles and more. Access a range of coverage for the U.S., Australia and the world, including investigations, cultural commentary and analysis.


Download the app to enjoy all of The Times, all in one place: breaking news and in-depth reporting, plus games, recipes, audio journalism, product reviews, sports coverage and more.



BREAKING NEWS AND LIVE UPDATES
- Push notifications deliver the latest headlines and developing stories as they happen.
- Your daily news app that helps you stay informed as news breaks.
- Add widgets and custom alerts to keep up with the latest Australian and world news.

ORIGINAL REPORTING AND IN-DEPTH ANALYSIS
- Read, watch and listen to investigative reporting and insights.
- Access global news from 1,700 Times journalists reporting from 150 countries.
- Explore complex stories brought to life through data and visual journalism.

NEWS VIDEOS
- Watch videos featuring reporters, critics and other experts.
- Get closer to the story with videos across news and culture.
- Understand breaking news, top stories, culture reporting and more, in video.

INFORMED AUDIO NEWS
- Listen to a variety of audio journalism, including podcasts and narrated articles.
- Tune in to daily podcasts like “The Daily” and “The Headlines.”

ARTS, SCIENCE, TECHNOLOGY AND LIFESTYLE COVERAGE
- Discover reporting across arts, culture, fashion, travel and more.
- Stay informed on topics like technology, science and health.
- Explore culture with podcasts like “Modern Love” and “The Interview.”

SAVE, FOLLOW AND PERSONALIZE
- Easily save and access articles on topics you care about.
- See what’s new for you with personalized recommendations based on your tastes and reading history.

WORD, VISUAL AND NUMBER GAMES
- Unwind with daily games like the Crossword, Wordle, Connections, the Mini, Spelling Bee and Sudoku.

INSPIRING RECIPES
- Explore recipe ideas for easy weeknight dinners, holiday showstoppers and more.

COMMUNITY CONVERSATIONS
- Engage with Times reporters and readers in our moderated comments section. 
- Subscribers can share 10 articles per month with anyone.

DIGITAL SUBSCRIPTIONS
Enjoy everything we offer with a New York Times All Access subscription, which includes unlimited access to:
— Investigations, culture and analysis from News
— Word, visual and number puzzles from Games
— Recipes, videos, advice and inspiration from Cooking
— Independent product reviews from Wirecutter
— In-depth, personalized sports coverage from The Athletic

Get fearless, independent journalism with the Guardian app. Never miss breaking news, dive into diverse opinion pieces, and follow stories minute-by-minute with our dynamic live blogs - from world news and politics to business and sport. Get the following app exclusive features:

My Guardian - Your own custom feed of your favourite topics and writers, so you can follow the stories you care most about. 

Puzzles - Whether you're looking for classics like Soduku and Crosswords, or fun word games like Wordiply and Word wheel, we have the puzzle for you. 

Podcasts - Listen to our award-winning podcasts directly in the Guardian app. 
 
Listen to Articles - Can't read our articles? Listen to them instead. You can get realistic audio transcription of every article we publish - excluding live blogs. 

The Guardian news app is free to download and offers you a beautiful, intuitive mobile experience – so you can read, watch and listen to our independent reporting whenever and wherever it suits you. Readers have a limited number of articles, which refreshes on a regular basis. If you’re a regular reader, you might consider subscribing. Subscribing gives you full access to Guardian articles in our app, so you can read quality, international journalism with no restrictions.

And, when you subscribe, you’ll unlock:

Unlimited reading in the app, with no subscription messages
Ad-free reading, for an uninterrupted experience
Offline reading – download articles to explore on the go

What’s more, subscribing to our news app is a great way to show your support for fearless, independent Guardian journalism. As a reader-funded news organisation, we rely on your funding to power our future. Thank you.

All content in the Guardian app is copyright Guardian News & Media 2025. All rights reserved.

Nerdish is a self-education app for adults who aim to learn and know more about the world. Read concise and engaging articles with insights on topics related to science, history, arts, society, technology, famous people, food, daily things and other fields of general knowledge. Nerdish helps you learn something new every day with quick 5–10 minute reads.

Nerdish offers:
- Short, science-based, and inspiring learning articles across categories like Art and Culture, History, Science, Technology, Psychology, Health, Politics, and Society.
- All content is designed for self-education on the go — brief, fact-checked, well-structured, and perfect for curious minds who love learning.
- Get maximum knowledge in minimum time with quick daily reads that make education simple, engaging, and fun.

The articles featured in Nerdish are short, science-based, and easy to read — yet far from being just collections of random facts.
Each topic delivers essential knowledge in a clear, structured way, helping you learn the basics of science, history, art, and more in just minutes.
Key ideas across different articles are logically connected, creating a deeper understanding of the world and helping knowledge stick.
Nerdish makes self-education simple and inspiring — combining learning, discovery, and personal growth in every read.

Nerdish is a perfect match for those who:
- Love learning and discovering new facts every day.
- Enjoy reading short, engaging, and educational articles.
- Are curious about the world and excited to expand their general knowledge.
- Love nonfiction books and smart, inspiring reads.
- Enjoy finding new ideas and connections between things they already know.

Nerdish is a new way to approach lifelong learning and self-development.
The world around us is constantly changing, and expanding your knowledge helps you stay inspired, think creatively, and adapt with ease. At work, on a date, or at a party — it always feels good to be the one who knows a bit more. With Nerdish, you can keep learning every day and become that curious, confident, and well-informed person everyone loves to talk to.

Learn with us about: 
- History and civilization: ancient empires, great discoveries, revolutions, and remarkable people who changed the world.
- Science and nature: the human body, space, evolution, physics, and everyday phenomena explained simply.
- Art and culture: painting, music, architecture, design, literature, and creative movements.
- Psychology and society: emotions, thinking, habits, communication, and social change.
- Technology and innovation: AI, inventions, space exploration, and the tools that shape modern life.
- Daily life and fun facts: why the sky is blue, how coffee was discovered, or where common ideas come from.

Nerdish is making popular science more popular.

Le Monde diplomatique is the place you go when you want to know what’s really happening. This is a major international paper that is truly independent, that sees the world in fresh ways, that focuses on places no other publications reach. We offer a clear, considered view of the conflicting interests and complexities of a modern global world.

Please note: this is the French-language edition. The English edition is available as a separate app.

The iPad/iPhone edition brings you selected pages from the latest issue as soon as it is published. Within the application you can upgrade to full access, which brings you every page of the issue and a searchable archive of back issues. For the duration of your subscription you have access to every issue in this archive.

During your subscription you can sync back issues to your device. These will remain in place if your subscription expires, unless your device removes them (for example when running low on disk space). Re-downloading issues requires a current subscription.

• Swipe or tap the page edges to flip to next/previous page.
• Use the animated thumbnail view to flick through the pages.
• Pinch or double-tap pages to zoom.
• Search the current issue or the archive.
• Sync the latest issue to your device for offline reading.
• Sync additional back issues.
                                                                      
We recommend first running the app within a wi-fi area so it can sync the latest issue to your device - after that you can use it anywhere. Subscribers will receive new issues automatically via Newsstand.
